attributes.action: Stop anti-Islam message to the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those of you who watch BBC's East Enders and are Pakistani Muslims know that there is no way ANY Muslim would, by any chance, pick their burnt food from kitchen floor and feed their guests with it.

It seems that BBC does not know that much about their own people who live in this country for centuries - you can't be more ignorant that that, can you?

The problem is more serious than ignorance or attitude towards Muslims. The problem is to do with the same point I have always mentioned in my other blogs that the British had always had problems with people - in particular Indians or other Christians - becoming Muslims since 1918, because they will become "uncivilized"!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
